identificationInfo.description:
A syntactic parser for English. With a wide-coverage probabilistic HPSG grammar and an efficient parsing algorithm, this parser can effectively analyze syntactic/semantic structures of English sentences and provide a user with phrase structures and predicate-argument structures.
Main features: Accurate deep analysis - the parser can output both phrase structures and predicate-argument structures. The accuracy of predicate-argument relations is around 90% for newswire articles and biomedical papers. High speed - parsing speed is less than 500 msec. per sentence by default (faster than most Penn Treebank parsers), and less than 50 msec. when using the high-speed setting ("mogura").
Enju website: http://www.nactem.ac.uk/enju
